product_name: Red River Gorge Rock Climbs - North - Volume 1
long_description: . Author: Ray Ellington. Softcover, 232 pages, color photographs. Wolverine Publishing; copyright 2012. Volume 1 of. Among the Kentucky cliffs included in this guide are Military Wall, Left Flank, Long Wall and Funk Rock City. Climbs are divided into sport climbs, traditional climbs and boulder problems. Features access information, local eateries and services and introductory glosses on each area. Detailed maps orient you to the climb, and illustrated photos direct you up the routes.
short_description: Red River Gorge Rock Climbs provides detailed information on climbing the spectacular sandstone in eastern Kentucky. This volume covers the northern half of the gorge.
